title: Earthquakes FE. More features and samples
description: General informationCorrectly predicting earthquakes is very important for preventing deaths and damage to infrastructure. In this competition we try to predict time left to the next laboratory earthquake based on seismic signal data. Training data represents one huge signal, but in test data we have many separate chunks, for each of which we need to predict time to failure. This is my second kernel for this competition, here is the link to the first one. In this kernel I'll try to create more useful features and generate more data for training.
